title: Policewoman On The Porno Squad, La Poliziotta Della Squadra Del Buon Costume 1979

sources.title: Policewoman On The Porno Squad, La Poliziotta Della Squadra Del Buon Costume 1979
sources.description: The adventures of Gianna, a sexy police woman (Edwige Fenech) who wants to help a child in the search of his mother, who has ended up in trouble. She has become a prostitute and is kept prisoner along the way. Fenech again with Alvaro Vitali and Lino Banfi. And directed by Michele Massimo Tarantini. I wonder if they all just enjoyed working together.Â  Sort of an Italian precursor to the Police Academy movies or maybe the Vice Academy movies Italian with optional English subtitles
